alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 23 at 7:20PM HST until December 25 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A large, long period north-northwest (330 degrees) swell peaking Sunday afternoon will gradually decline through Monday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Surf peaking at 18 to 22 feet along north facing shores and 10 to 14 feet along west facing shores Sunday. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Oahu and Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
